question: LOU: I know people were rolling insight checks to figure out if I was telling the truth or not and you could tell I was lying and you didn't ask about it. Which section describes how to make an insight check?
answer: The rules for insight checks are not in the SRD without having to do with a mechanic. A successful check might reveal that a person is lying or attempting to mislead you.
rules_explanation: You can make a Wisdom (Insight) check to determine whether someone is lying or attempting to mislead you. An insight check involves gleaning clues from body language, speech habits, and changes in mannerisms. The rules do not explain if it is possible to determine whether the results of an insight check are true.
